learning_objective: Use appropriate terminology in identifying and describing the function of common physical components of computing systems (hardware).
question_str:
{
    "Question": "Alex has decided to build a custom computer. They need a device designed to rotate and move air to cool down the components of the computer. What is the correct technical name for this device?",
    "Answer1": "Heat sink",
    "Answer2": "Liquid coolers",
    "Answer3": "Fans",
    "Answer4": "Radiators",
    "CorrectAnswer": "3",
    "Explanation": "Fans are used in computers to move air and cool down the components. Heat sinks dissipate heat in the area of a heat-producing component, and liquid coolers or radiators also dissipate heat but via different mechanisms."
}
